Blog.post: Hey

ahh design ur own t-shirts, the badge is on the left breast (blushs) so that leave su a a lot of room to play with, please note the t-shirts are RED!!! and they cant be offensive or they will be removed. this is to others and ppl in are group!
urlLink The Official PEEWITS logo as Designed by Hazel Fisk urlLink

I have just tried searching for PEEWITS on google search engine. It came up with numerous results Clive is leading us to believe that PEEWITS stands for Plymouth East Explorers With Intention Of Travelling Somwhere. But I foud out that a PEEWIT is, a small dark bird with a white chest and raised feathers on its head I know there are may more defintions for PEEWITS, so I now set the challenge for people to find other meanings and post them on the blog.

To Put a message on this page. Goto urlLink this link and sign in, then click on the Peewits Blog - Given the title shown above. then on the page that opens the publish tab should be open with a text input box This is the box you type in to post messages for the front page of the blog - This one. Happy blogging

I have set this Blog up for ANY MEMBER of the Peewits to use, if you are a member and have been sent here please e-mail Olly (oli on the sheet) from the pack sent to you by Clive and Jenny. The e-mail must include details that will be posted later Olly
Ben, as head of the t-shirt team how long are we going to have to wait?

Maybe It would be nice to get CHEAP SKI EQUIPMENT as we are going to Switzerland. This won't make much sense to anyone, the google ads at the top respond to keywords in posts and titles. Please Give me you e-mail address if you wish to join. Olly

To Put a message on this page. Goto www.blogspot.com or urlLink this link and sign in, then click on the B200 blog - Given the title shown above. then on the page that opens the publish tab should be open with "Create" higlighted and a text input box This is the box you type in to post messages for the front page of the blog - This one. To View This Site GOTO urlLink b200.blogspot.com . You can then press "refresh" to see as new posts arrive. Happy blogging
urlLink Rob's Logo For His Tour of Small festivals - Without Me his mullier ami urlLink

If i sound angry, i am giving a prior warning, I AM ANNOYED! People we need more organization. 5 weeks ago i mentioned the tour, 5 BLOODY WEEKS!!!! and now what, nobody can afford it. You All could when i suggested it, so whats different now? I gave people a predicted cost of £50 - £80, which the actual cost falls into. OK, i can understand if you are going somewhere else, ...

Last Night was The Best concert i have ever been to, including TRAVIS. Jamie Cullum was absolutly amazing, the 2 supports were also very good (Lucie Silvas and Tom Baxter). Jaime took every song form his Twenty Something album and made each of them completly original. Covers of "Frontin" and "High and Dry" were inspirational. Then, taking the whole audience and getting us to sing a 3 part harmony (which sounded amazing)... pure magic. His 2 encores were top quality. He is undoubtably the greatest artist in the last 4 years to perform in the Pavailions! and i think thousands of other people would agree with me. He Almost destroyed his piano constantly beating it with his hands, chairs, stands, feet and pretty much anything he could get his hands on. Yet it still stayed perfectly in tune. His "good luck carpet" kept the audience entertained - Though really it wasn't needed. Acapello, harmonies, solos, inspirational playing, amazing drumming on the piano the concert had it all. I am amazed at how little this account has come to, but words can not describe the brilliance of it. There just aren't enough of concerts of this standard coming to Plymouth.
... The day I've got 1 exam left. Today, has been great. Three reasonably easy Science exams in the moring, all you can eat pizza, and an afternoon of networked Red Alert 2. Not much could be better

ZUTONS!!!!!!! great song

The Week of Hell Ends Today. The weeks of pure fun begin tomorrow World Record Sleepover Attempt tomorrow night Sunday im out to the caravan to see everyone Tuesday - All You Can Eat Pizza and Pasta @ Pizza Hut. Wednesday - Diabolo Workshop Friday - Jamie Cullum Gig @ Plymouth Pavillions Thursday - Tuesday - small amounts of RE Revision Wed 30th - Going to Exeter. Probably diabolo workshop, if i can eb aresd to get home in time for it. NO MORE SCHOOL TILL SEPTEMBER

On The 30th June i am destined to visit Air Time in Exter. The current shopping list is as follows. 2 Mister Babache Rubber Kings 1 Mister Babache Birdie 1 Henery's Beach 1 whatever Claire Wants 2 Performer Hand Sticks 1 Reel of String 25m 3 Juggling balls While i'm there if you want anything please post a comment and give me the money by 25th June

What a day! my final maths exam and spent an hour diaboloing... great. Heard Scissor Sister's Live Lounge Cover of Take Me Out. Pure Genius. Now going out to put the paddling pool up and dip my feet in while revising french and listening to Colin and Edith. See You Later

Hey everyone that reads this blog. (ok its only me, but who cares...) I am having a great time in Suffolk, spent today hanging around my uncles Ice Cream van scaring away his customers - (i honestly thought diabolos in the head would gain their attention!) but tomorrow, i go TENTING for a week at my Granny's in Redisham. Don't worry i don't really know where that is either i just get sent there... i will try to update as events (and tents i guess) unfold if i can gain Internet Acess for the Bungalow that is to be called "home" for another week...... Til then Auf Vidersen
